mapper.select: SELECT borderId, userId, borderTitle, borderLike, borderDate FROM border ORDER BY borderId DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT borderId, userId, borderTitle, borderContent, borderLike FROM border WHERE borderId = #{borderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO border (userId, borderTitle, borderContent, borderDate, borderLike) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{borderTitle}, #{borderContent}, now(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE border SET borderTitle = #{borderTitle}, borderContent = #{borderContent}, borderDate = now() WHERE borderId = #{borderId}
UPDATE border SET borderLike = borderLike+1 WHERE borderId = #{borderId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(borderId) FROM border WHERE borderId > 0
